availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann "Polly" Lynn Mooney in Union County, Kentucky, on January 28, 1841. Father of Squire Mooney and Paulina Mooney. Married to Susannah E. Brown Mooney. Father of Martha J. Mooney, Mary Mooney, Samuel D. Mooney, Susannah Mooney, and Esther F. Mooney. Farmer in Hopkins County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Webster County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 123B.

Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Union County Marriages, Film 000562197.
